publicationStmt.p: This is an XML-TEI markup of the original publications by SIL Mexico for the purposes of: archival and for the creation of a body of Mixtepec-Mixtec language resources (LR) (ISO: mix). Encoded documents used with the permission of original authors.

notesStmt.note: Éste es el cuento de una rana y un zopilote que se hicieron amigos. Continuamente la rana le decía mentiras al zopilote, y debido a eso, la rana tuvo resultados desastrosos. El final de este cuento enseña el porqué las ranas tienen el cuerpo achatado.

sourceDesc.bibl: Sa'va tsi lochi Gómez Hernández, María(speaker); Beckmann, Gisela; Nieves, María M.. 2008 (2nd ed.).Instituto Lingüístico de Verano, A.C. Tlalpan, D.F., México Obtained from:

textDesc.channel: @mode:'w' means that the primary means of utilising this document is by reading it's written form;

normalization.ab: 2018-03-24Spelling of lexical items which in the old orthography were homographs and which have been changed according to updated orthographic principles as per ../Mille/GUIA_ORTOGRAFICA_PRELIMINAR_Short_version.xml. Instances of "ña" still remain to be changed pending consultation with Mille (or other person working on orthography). In this document the extended senses of "face" - "nuu" were not normalized as I am awaiting discussion as to whether this particular sense should also be changed to "nu".

spanGrp.span: Before the Earth began, frogs used to shaped like an egg.
Antes de la tierra empezó, las ranas tenían la forma de un huevo.
At this time, the frog's best friend was the vulcher.
En este tiempo, el mejor amigo de la rana era el buitre.
One day the vulture friend invited the frog to go to a wedding party.
Un día el amigo buitre le invitó la rana a ir a una fiesta de boda.
And the party will be really high up in the clouds.
Y la fiesta va a ser a muy gran altura en las nubes.
really high up in the clouds
a muy gran altura en las nubes
Let's go frog, you'll have a good time.
Vayamos rana, te vas a gozar.
Good, tomorrow I'll come pick you up.
The vulcher picked up his basket and went looking for the frog.
And at the frog's house they said he already left, he is already waiting at the party.
Then his feelings were hurt and he flew away.
When he got to the clouds, the frog came out from the basket and said:
Quando llegó en las nubes, la rana salió del tenate y dijó:
Friend frog, have you been here since the early morning?
Amigo rana, ¿tu has estado aqui desde temprano?
The party was really nice, they ate, there was music.
At about 3am, the frog said to the vulcher:
A aproximamente las tres de la mañana, la rana dijó a la zipitole:
Friend, I'm going to leave because I'm very tired.
Amigo, voy irme por qué estoy muy cansado.
And then the frog got back into the basket and waited for the vulcher to leave and to bring it down from the clouds.
And so it happened, when he arrived at his house, that the vulcher didn't know that he had left the frog behind.
Later that day, the vulcher invited the frog to another party in the clouds.
And so, the frog climbed once again into the basket.
And then he climbed up to the clouds and the the vulcher didn't know.
They were standing in the clouds dancing.
When it was late the frog said:
Quando era tarde la rans dijó:
Then he went inside the vulcher's basket again.
After some time, the vulcher found his basket in order to go home.
Después de un rato, el zopilote, encontré su cesta para irse a case.
And he was walking around dazed because he was dancing a lot.
But he mistook the basket and grabbed another basket that was lying near his.
Pero él se equivocó él de tenate, y agarró otro tenate que estaba cerca del tenate de él.
Now what am I going to do?
Said the frog when he saw the basket.
It flew a lot, and it fell down rapidly from the clouds and fell to the ground.
Because of that, today frogs now are very flat looking to.
Por eso las ranas hoy en día son muy planas como las conocemos.
